programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Family Ties Ep.6
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.

programme.title: Baby Animals - Prequel 1 - Raising Babies Ep.7
programme.desc: Follow the staff at Parc Omega in Quebec, Canada, during the busy spring when moose, boars, raccoons, and visiting Canada geese have their babies.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Sanctuary Ep.5
programme.desc: There’s strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, it’s the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation – finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Madagascar Ep.2
programme.desc: The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep.4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep.4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Drakensberg: Barrier of Spears Ep.1

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Flood Ep.2
programme.desc: Waters flood Southern Florida's mangroves and marshes. Many of the 600 animal species that live in the Everglades disperse during this time, expanding their hunting and breeding grounds.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Cocos Island Ep.1
programme.desc: Dubbed "the most beautiful island in the world" by Jacques Cousteau, Cocos Island is a gem among Costa Rica’s national parks. Aboard the Undersea Hunter, we’ll explore the area’s hammerhead and Galapagos sharks, rays, and other large marine species that populate these deep waters.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Head & Neck Ep.1
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Human Influenced Ep.2
programme.desc: In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet we’ve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Reef Wrecks of Bonaire Ep.1
programme.desc: Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Wanderers of the Lost Forest Ep.3
programme.desc: This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep.3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep.5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Flood Ep.2
programme.desc: Waters flood Southern Florida's mangroves and marshes. Many of the 600 animal species that live in the Everglades disperse during this time, expanding their hunting and breeding grounds.

programme.desc: Dubbed "the most beautiful island in the world" by Jacques Cousteau, Cocos Island is a gem among Costa Rica’s national parks. Aboard the Undersea Hunter, we’ll explore the area’s hammerhead and Galapagos sharks, rays, and other large marine species that populate these deep waters.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep.3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep.5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Creatures Great and Small Ep.5
programme.desc: See Amanda and Sophie push boundaries to get a vervet monkey with a broken leg back into the wild, the team is challenged when collaring a four-ton elephant. Alma receives an orphaned, cat-like genet and an antisocial baboon rejoins a troop.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Catch Me if You Can Ep.6
programme.desc: Join the rescue as Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, a lion threatens a village, and the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Head & Neck Ep.1
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Reef Wrecks of Bonaire Ep.1
programme.desc: Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Flood Ep.2
programme.desc: Waters flood Southern Florida's mangroves and marshes. Many of the 600 animal species that live in the Everglades disperse during this time, expanding their hunting and breeding grounds.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep.26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part Ii - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.desc: Chevronica Mars / The Boy With The Dragon That Flew - It's Dot vs. Chevron in a cutthroat Mars simulation contest. A flying cybertronic dragon helps take Tiny to new heights.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep.39
programme.desc: Rupert And The Apple River - Rupert and friends are going apple picking by the river. It's a hot day, so Ping Pong offers to magic up some fizzy apple drink for them all to drink afterwards. But her spell goes very wrong, sending giant apples rolling down into the river. Just as Rupert is suggesting Ping Pong try again they are all amazed to see Ming float by, surrounded by apply-bubbles. Ping Pong's giant magic apples have turned the river into a fizzy apple juice river, and the bubbles make you float. Soon Rupert and friends are having a great time, sucking in bubbles and floating about. But then Edward notices a problem. The apples are causing a log jam at the bridge and unless they can get them out, the river will flood. How will they get the river back to normal and prevent Nutwood being swept away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep.40
programme.desc: Rupert To The Rescue! - Freddy and Freda “borrow” Ping Pong's Magic Book and accidentally say a spell that makes their toy cupboard float off across Nutwood. Rupert takes charge of trying to stop the runaway item of furniture before it does any damage, trying to lasso it. But the Fox Twins meddle again, and Ping Pong gets tangled up in the lasso, ends up floating high in the sky, dangling from the flying cupboard! Things become even more serious when she floats out over the sea and gets stranded on a rock. Rupert has to make the Fox Twins face up to the trouble they've caused, and find a way to undo the magic.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep.39
programme.desc: The Diary - Pod 4's plan to go to a movie gets derailed when Birch realizes she's “lost” her diary. Realizing it's in the office of The Cosmos Chronicle, Birch enlists the help of the others to intercept the newspaper before it gets distributed! The race is on to see if Birch can save herself from imminent disaster.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep.40
programme.desc: Raffi'S Secret Love - Eavesdropping, Birch misinterprets a conversation between her cousin and Raffi. She convinces herself that Raffi is in love with her justifying his increasingly odd behaviour as signs of his affection. By the time she finds out why he's scavenging for special labels, Birch has their entire future mapped out.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep.91
programme.desc: Fifi'S Happy Day - Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep.92
programme.desc: Fly High Primrose - Fifi, Bumble and Violet are trying to pick all the blackberries before the wind blows them to the ground. But soon they have something very different to catch as Primrose flies past!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep.39
programme.desc: Gnash Hit - Gnasher becomes the star of an action movie, playing Grizzly’s on-screen sidekick. But the demands of filming keep him and Dennis apart, leaving Dennis feeling sidelined! Could Dennis & Gnasher really become Grizzly & Gnasher?!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep.40
programme.desc: Heroes In A Half-Pipe - Dennis needs to pull off a magnificent stunt to save the skate park from closure so Gran gives him the skateboard of the legendary 'Kendo 360' - but the special board goes missing at the worst possible moment leaving Dennis needing to dig deep and nose grind on his own board!

programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Frenzied Farts Of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.desc: Grandpa'S Treasures - In the wake of her grandfather's death, Lucky sets out to show the town his softer side and give him the goodbye he deserves.

programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep.3
programme.desc: Sherman'S Pet/ Marco Polo - Sherman begs Peabody to keep a Wolly Mammoth he names Captain Cools as his pet; Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges to discover spaghetti.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep.20
programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh — Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep.1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep.1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly… he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled… until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep.2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs… hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep.1
programme.desc: Case Of The Broken Crystal Memory Game - All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep.2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep.1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep.2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep.27
programme.desc: Sawmetrodon - Ty, Revvit and the crew save a band of Woodland Reptools from an evil and destructive Sawmetradon named Splitter who refuses to join the Trux team.

programme.desc: Australian Blunder Down Under - When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.desc: Dare Dennis - Dennis and the gang are suffering from dinner lady Olive’s completely inedible school dinners. In their mission to ‘drop the slop’, they discover a poster of her past career as a singer. Dennis’ eureka moment leads to asking her to join The Dinmakers - hoping she’d trade a life in the kitchen for the limelight. However after unleashing Olive’s inner diva their mission is to get Olive back into the kitchen!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep.3
programme.desc: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer/Grug Vs The Moon - When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear; Grug picks a fight with the moon.

programme.title: 3 Below: Tales Of Arcadia Ep.17
programme.desc: Mother'S Day - Two royal teenage aliens and their bodyguard flee a surprise takeover of their home planet by an evil dictator and crash land in Arcadia. Now on the run from intergalactic bounty hunters, they struggle to blend in and adapt to the bizarre world of high school all the while attempting to repair their ship so they can return and defend their home planet.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep.53
programme.desc: Second To One - After the defeat of the Bloodwolf by the “One” Puss tries to be the best #2, but with the portal still open the San Lorenzans may still need more protection

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep.1
programme.desc: King Me - Uncle King Julien abdicates his throne, handing off his crown to Prince Julien. Let the reign of King Julien the Thirteenth begin.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep.72
programme.desc: Grandpa'S Treasures - In the wake of her grandfather's death, Lucky sets out to show the town his softer side and give him the goodbye he deserves.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep.27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep.47
programme.desc: Misadventureland Part 1 / Misadventureland Part 2 - Richie brings Lotta’s dream of a Horn-A-World theme park to life -- complete with actual Horn-A-Corns! But the reality is a bit of a nightmare.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep.41
programme.desc: Rupert And The Butterfly Collector - Rupert, Bill and Edward set off to look for butterflies in the wood. In particular they hope to see the rare Polka Dot Butterfly. On the way, they meet a Butterfly Collector who is also looking for the Polka Dot but - instead of just enjoying watching the butterfly - he wants to catch it in his net and keep it in a jar. The friends see it as their mission to protect the Polka Dot and let it fly free.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep.42
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Stars - Rupert pedals his car to meet Bill and Ping Pong at the tree house where they plan to spend the night. On his way he meets Raggety who is very proud of the new lantern he has made from glowing bugs he found in the forest. Rupert invites him to sleep at the tree house but Raggety announces he is a big brave elf and wants to sleep by himself. At the tree house, Bill has a surprise for Rupert. Astra the Star Girl has come to Nutwood, but sadly she has not come to play. She dropped some new stars while she was hanging them in the sky. They have fallen down to Earth and she has followed them to Nutwood. She has to get them back in the sky before nightfall or they will miss their first moonlight and fade away forever. Ping Pong magics Rupert's car into a flying car to assist their search but there are lots of shiny things in Nutwood sending them on false trails. Evening approaches and time is running out. Meanwhile, Raggety prepares for his night alone, and discovers the glowing bugs in his lantern can talk.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep.41
programme.desc: Skate Club - Sandra insists on breaking the gender barrier of a “boys only” skateboard race. But the race is one with a history for being incredibly dangerous. Will Sandra let Liam “save” her or will she save her reputation as the coolest sk8terchick at Cosmos High?

programme.title: My Life Me Ep.42
programme.desc: Pinged And Ponged - A little white lie told to his ping-pong loving grandmother forces Raffi to actually try out for the team when they make the finals. Grandma is keen to see her favourite grandson play her favourite sport and he's not about to let her down. It soon becomes apparent that normally athletic Raffi is all thumbs when it comes to what team captain Antoine pretentiously refers to as table tennis.

programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep.112
programme.desc: Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective - It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park. // DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep.115
programme.desc: Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep.116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep.213
programme.desc: Blue's Show and Tell Surprise - Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep.325
programme.desc: Pups Raise the PAW Patroller / Pups Save the Crows - Daring Danny’s at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller. // Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep.222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois - Cap’n Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck.

programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.desc: Annie-versary / Teacher's Pet - When Pony celebrates a special day, Annie needs to figure out what's so special about it. // Pony finally gets to go to school with Annie when he's named class pet.

programme.desc: Make Over and Over / Lights ! Camera ! Grizzled ! - With the help of Harl Hubbs' giant crane, Ave Empire tries to put his "perfect" Opera House in the perfect spot. // Detective Sam Grizzled is hired as a consultant on a movie about a bank robbery he foiled in his early police days.

programme.desc: Duke Time / Harpy Stubbs - An exhausted Duke Detain takes his first day off after an uncharacteristic mistake on duty. // An unlikely friendship develops between Poppy Starr, the world's biggest pop star, and Harl Hubbs, the city's humble, helpful handyman.

programme.desc: Instant Gram - Dave gets an 'Instant Gram' account and after several embarrassing posts, Alvin does all he can to stop him.

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep.210
programme.desc: Power Problems Part 1 - Danger Force's superpowers are mysteriously on the fritz. As the team searches for an explanation some new friends at a popular seafood restaurant provide free food and pirate hospitality to keep their spirits high.

programme.desc: Da Wish App - Stuck inside because of 'Hornet Day,' Viv and Roy are left to their own devices while Cosmo and Wanda spend the day in Fairy World. Things soon get out of hand when Roy uses 'Da Wish App' to summon his Granny Razz.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep.113

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep.420
programme.desc: Don't You Fore-get About Me / Tough Cookies - Hit by the realization that her big sister will be going off to college soon, Leni tries to thwart Lori's plans. // Lincoln and Clyde start their own cookie-making business, but realize it's a lot more work than they realized.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep.102
programme.desc: Lost and Found Part 2 - Dal must gather an unlikely crew for their newfound ship if they are going to escape Tars Lamora, but The Diviner and his daughter Gwyn have other plans.

programme.title: UFC 279: Diaz vs Ferguson
programme.desc: Main Event - A welterweight showdown between two of UFC’s top stars headlines the Octagon’s return to T-Mobile Arena at UFC 279! In the main event, Stockton’s own Nate Diaz goes toe-to-toe with fellow action superstar Tony “El Cucuy” Ferguson in a battle of fan favorites. Plus, undefeated rising contender Khamzat “Borz” Chimaev battles Kevin “Trailblazer” Holland, and Li “The Leech” Jingliang takes on Daniel “D-Rod” Rodriguez.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep.17
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep.504ChrisBarnettFeatherweightsDricusduPlessisKhaosWilliams
programme.desc: Heavyweight Chris Barnett explains how Taekwondo and dancing helped shape his unique style inside the Octagon. UFC featherweight Cub Swanson gives us a look into the history of the 126 pound division. South African prospect Dricus du Plessis details his country’s rich sporting history, and what it means to represent them on MMA’s biggest stage. And welterweight “Khaos” Williams brings us back to his UFC Debut at UFC 247

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep.1
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
